1152311.content:
Your name is Mike Herring and you go to a high school at Beverly Hills. You’re a straight A student and student body president of this school. It was just another day for you as you head for the library looking for a book to study for your upcoming test.

“Ah. There you are.” You said as you found the book you were looking for.

As you grabbed the book, another hand comes to take it too. You were about to tell this person that you found it first until you stopped to when you see something that made you blush.

Actually, it was someone. For who you see is a girl with long red hair and emerald green eyes. She looks so beautiful to you.

“Oh. I’m sorry. I just needed that book for my test next week.” She apologized.

“That’s funny. I have that same test next week too.” You said still blushing.

“That is funny. Oh yeah. Don’t want to be rude. I’m Samantha Simpson. But you can call me Sam.” Sam introduced herself.

“Mike. Mike Herring.” You introduced yourself.

“The student president? No way. This is a surprise.” Sam said giggling.

“I’m glad you think so. Say, uh, since we have the same test, how about we, you know, study together?” You asked nervously.

“Sure. I’d love to, Mike.” Sam said.

And so, you two read the book together and you sometimes get distracted by seeing Sam and all of her beauty.

It was right there that you are in love.
1152311.title: Yeah

145331.content: So here is how you get to meet our dream girl Red Sonja
145331.title: Red Sonja

1453312.content:
You're a twenty three year old trust fund baby who has a pretty sweet life. You work from home (when you choose to work), and home is a condo on the beach. You're not a gym rat, but you're in decent enough shape, and with your looks, your green eyes and sandy blonde hair, not to mention your money, you never have to worry about getting a date if you want one.

You're real passion, though, is Red Sonja.

You have every comic, every movie poster, every action figure, every book...if it's Red Sonja related, you've got it. You even have a signed and numbered print of a Boris Vallejo book cover:

https://i1.wp.com/www.thegeeklikes.com/w...

You even have a small album of autographs of actresses who played Red Sonja on television or in the movies, who voiced Red Sonja, or who even were seriously considered when a Red Sonja project looked to be getting off the ground. If there's something Red Sonja related, you've got it.

Except Red Sonja herself.

Of course, you know she's a fictional character, but you have numerous fantasies, from the romantic to the erotic, that involve the bikini chainmail clad warrior. Of course, since she isn't real, none of those fantasies will ever come real.

And then one day, your fantasies of having your fantasies come true. You're going to get to have your dream girl Red Sonja thanks to
1453312.title: She comes to your world

14533121.content:
So it's kind of weird, you think to yourself, but you'd really like to "Date" (and other things) a fictional character who does not exist.

Obviously you can't have a romantic relationship with a woman who doesn't exist, but maybe you can have a romantic relationship with an artificial recreation of Red Sonja. You've been watching this TV series about robots who look like humans, with some of them even developing consciousness. And you've read about these sex robots who are very realistic. Maybe you can have a romantic relationship with Red Sonja after all.

After a length investigation on the subject matter, you discover that the technology for what you want
14533121.title: a realistic android

145331212.content: You have in your mind what the perfect Red Sonja robot would be like and be able to do, but you discover the technology to create this just doesn't exist. You invest in some startups, hoping to eventually get what you want, but nothing ever pans out.
145331212.title: doesn't exist

choices: Red Sonja appears full sized in the room
a six inch tall Red Sonja steps out of the book cover
14533123.content:
The thing about being a rich obsessive collector is that, when other people find out your obsessive, they bring you stuff related to your obsession that you might never have come across.

Some of the stuff you really never wanted to come across. But some of it is unique, and you're happy you bought it.

One of the things you found this was was the scroll.

The scroll was supposedly a prop that was bought or created in preparation for the Red Sonja project that was to star Rose McGowan, before she was injured. There were rumors that the scroll, which consisted of Sumerian cuneiform, wasn't a prop at all, but was a magical spell which could supposedly bring the real Red Sonja to your reality.

Of course, you don't believe that. Outside of books and the big screen, magic isn't real. But you are curious about the scroll, and actually dedicate a good deal of your free time researching the scroll and learning how to translate and say the words on it.

Because there's a secret part of you, secret even to yourself, that hopes the scroll is real.

One night, after you've had a few drinks, you get your signed book cover out of its case, and put it next to the scroll. You start speaking the words while looking at the book cover. You don't know why you're doing this, but you're doing it. Suddenly
14533123.title: magic

1453312311.title: begins tearing up the room

You watch in awe and wonder as a tiny Red Sonja steps out of the cover of the book and becomes real. Okay, she's on six inches tall, but she's still real.

She looks up at you and, without hesitation, becomes
145331232.title: a six inch tall Red Sonja steps out of the book...

1453312322.content:
"Are you the Gentle One?" she asks.

"Uh, excuse me?" you manage to suavely say. The fact that a tiny, buxom redheaded warrior, clad only in a chainmail bikini, is speaking perfect English to you is not helping you to adapt to this new reality.

"I once met a sage name Enosiw, whom I told I would be with no man unless he could defeat me in battle. He informed me that this was not so. He said I would come to a giant by magic, a giant he called the Gentle One. He said the giant would teach me trust, and the.n I and the giant would stand as equals. Are you the Gentle One?"

"Uh, yeah," you manage to say.

Sonja sets down her sword and says, "Then you may pick me up."

You pick up the tiny Red Sonja and
1453312322.title: cooperative

She has the look of someone who knows how to use the sword she's toting around, and use it in a deadly fashion.

1453312332.title: Dig it out a few months later

14533123322.content: What year do you travel back to?
14533123322.title: You travel back in time

choices: one of the movie's executive producers
an actor with a minor supporting role
145331233221.content:
The world around you seems to "flicker" for a few moments, for a lack of a better word, then the world goes dark.

When the lights come back on, you find yourself on a movie set. And you don't know how, but you know exactly where you are.

You're still you, of course, but you know your personal history has been changed so that it fits the year 1984. You're still a trust fund baby who doesn't have to work, but still does just to have something to do. And you're still a Red Sonja collector, though you obviously don't have the items that were made after 1984.

And you're on the movie set of Red Sonja, the movie that came out...er comes out, in 1985. And you are

1453312332211.content:
As you stand on the set, looking around at everything, thoughts of how you got there in this era come to you. You lobbied hard to anyone in the movie business to get an adaptation of Red Sonja made. It was only when Conan the Barbarian became a hit that producer Dino Di Laurentiis listens to you. You agree to put up part of the budget in exchange for being an executive producer.
Then came the casting. You spent a whole year spitting out possible actresses to Dino, but he dismisses them for not being Amazonian enough. With eight weeks before production and your patience gone, you find yourself at a newsstand, where your eyes hit a fashion magazine. Seeing the woman on the cover, you buy it and take it to Dino. You thrust it in his face and say, "Here's your fucking Amazon!" Indeed, you championed Brigitte Nielsen through the whole process despite the naysayers.
That is why you have been such a hands-on producer through the shooting. You often butt heads with director Richard Fleischer over its differences from the comics, especially since the chain mail bikini was replaced with what you call "that dress".
So it was no surprise that you were here now. You see Brigitte rehearsing her moves for the scene, and the director is trying to get your attention. Who wins out?
1453312332211.title: Money Man

choices: He goes back to the present
14533123322111.content:
Since you have been guiding Brigitte through the whole thing, it's natural that your attention goes to her first. So, you walk over to her. You may not be a fan of the dress, but you still think she fills it out rather nicely.
"Great form as usual," you say to her as she keeps practicing.
"Thanks," she says. "Can you grab a sword? I could use better practice."
You are all too glad to oblige, grabbing a sword and starting to swing it. She blocks your swing and starts a battle with you.
"I hope you don't come to the set solely on my account," Brigitte says.
"I'm here because I'm a fan of the comics and want to churn out the best version possible," you explain between swings.
"I wish you could explain that to Richard," she says.
"I've been trying," you say. "I can't fix egos easily. I'm new to this, same as you."
"I must admit that I admire your dedication," she says as she knocks your sword out of your hands and puts hers on the side of your neck.
"Thank you very much," you say. "I must admit that I actually enjoyed this practice with you."
She looks at you and smiles. "I wouldn't mind doing it on our own time."
"Neither would I."
14533123322111.title: A Talk With Her

145331233221111.content:
After shooting has wrapped up for the day and you had yet another argument with the director, you intentionally stay behind this time. You normally leave the set right away, but you want to see if she actually means what she said earlier.
It was as you were waiting that you start thinking about the spell that got you here. You wonder if this is only a temporary stopover, that you were the whole reason this movie was made in the first place for better or worse. It also crosses your mind that you could be altering reality if this is permanent. Will this change the course of many lives, or is this an Avengers: Endgame situation, where you are creating an alternate timeline? You would like to think that you save Brigitte from alcoholism and, worse yet, Flavor Flav.
Regardless, you are already here. You figure that you may as well make the most of it. You just have to stay prepared for anything.
Your thoughts get interrupted when you see Brigitte coming out of her trailer. She seems to have been prepared, given her little black dress and pumps.
"Oh, this has to be solely on my account," she says to you.
"Of course," you say.
"What are we doing first?"
145331233221111.title: Pondering

choices: Tell her only of the magic
Tell her only of your feelings
1453312332211111.content:
"I know of a good restaurant not too far from here," you say. "I figure that we can start there."
"That sounds good to me," she says as she walks off the set with you.
It doesn't take long to get to the restaurant, and you get a seat right away. You look across the table from you and smile as you look at the woman of your dreams.
It is with this thought that you start to think back. When did your infatuation with Red Sonja start? You recall being introduced to the character through the very movie you are helping to make. You knew back then that the action and acting sucks, but that was never the point to you. You watched it every chance you could just to ogle her. You start thinking that you kept collecting the memorabilia to recreate the feelings you developed for the woman across the table from you.
"Are you alright?"
Brigitte's words snap you back to reality. You look her in the eyes and wonder if you really should tell her. Whether it was your feelings or the magic was immaterial in this instance. He's hanging by a thin thread at this point.
1453312332211111.title: Sonja Or Brigitte?

choices: He goes back to the present
14533123322111114.content:
As you looks at her, you know that you have to think of something, anything, to say quickly. Naturally, you decide to say the first thing that comes to your mind.
"Sorry, but I'm still pissed at Richard for the way he is treating the material."
Brigitte smiles at you and holds your hand. "I get it," she says. "You want the comics to be honored properly. Any fan of any media wants that. You really shouldn't worry about it too much. He's a professional. He knows what he is doing."
"I hope so," you say. "I have a lot of my life into this."
"All of us do," she says.
You smile at her outwardly, but you're yelling at yourself in your mind. Are you really so yellow as to build this on a lie? What if you somehow get brought back to your own time? Would either of you be able to properly cope with that?
At the same time, you start wondering what could happen by rolling with it. Could you help her avoid those demons? What exactly was there for you in your own time? How much can events really change with you here?
14533123322111114.title: The Easy Way Out

choices: He goes back to the present
145331233221111141.content:
Later that night, after the two of you finish the customary dinner and a movie, you were surprised to hear Brigitte suggest going back to your place. Not one to pass up a rare opportunity, you readily agree. Needless to say, you quickly get to a condo that you didn't even know you owned earlier.
Both of you go inside, where you offer her a drink despite what you know about her and the fact that she is already buzzed. When she accepts, you get both of you a glass of whiskey. You quickly take it to her and sit next to her.
You just watch her drink, looking her up and down. As you haven't had much to drink, you are able to get a visible erection in your pants. Taking a chance, you sit in such a way that it is evident to her.
She looks down and sees your erection. "Are you having a good time?"
"Of course," you say as both of you lean in to kiss each other.
Before either of you know it, both of you are in the bedroom, all but ripping off each other's clothes. She gasps as you ease your length into her as deep as you can. You start thrusting your hips as you rub her body with your fingertips. She bucks her hips with you, trying to fluff you. Both of you are able to keep it up for an hour before both of you reach a hard, simultaneous orgasm, causing both of you look in each other's eyes and smile.

145331233222.content:
The world around you seems to "flicker" for a few moments, for a lack of a better word, then the world goes dark.

When the lights come back on, you find yourself on a movie set. And you don't know how, but you know exactly where you are.

You're still you, of course, but you know your personal history has been changed so that it fits the year 1997. You're still a trust fund baby who doesn't have to work, but still does just to have something to do. And you're still a Red Sonja collector, though you obviously don't have the items that were made after 1997.

And you're on the set of the television show Conan the Adventurer. Specifically, you're on the set while they are filming the episode "Red Sonja," with Angelica Bridges portraying Red Sonja. And you're on the set because you are

talk about funding a Red Sonja series starring the wrestler named Sable

145331233223.content:
The world around you seems to "flicker" for a few moments, for a lack of a better word, then the world goes dark.

When the lights come back on, you find yourself on a movie set. And you don't know how, but you know exactly where you are.

You're still you, of course, but you know your personal history has been changed so that it fits the year 2009. You're still a trust fund baby who doesn't have to work, but still does just to have something to do. And you're still a Red Sonja collector, though you obviously don't have the items that were made after 2009.

You look around and realize you are on the set of Red Sonja, during the early days of filming, before the filming was cancelled due to Rose McGowan's injury. In fact, you realize that today is the day that Rose McGowan is injured.

You

choices: invites you to come back to her trailer to talk some more
asks if she can take you to dinner that night
gives you an autographed picture of herself
1453312332231.content:
Somehow, you manage to save Rose McGowan from being injured, and history is changed. The Red Sonja movie comes out and, though it's not a blockbuster hit, it does become something of a cult classic, with a loyal following for years to come.

More importantly, everyone on the set is grateful that save Rose McGowan. Even more importantly, Rose McGowan is grateful that you saved Rose McGowan.

After a few minutes of talking to you (where you both discover that you're one of the many gofers on the set), Rose announces she's going to rest in her trailer for the rest of the day. Rose
1453312332231.title: manage to save Rose McGowan from injury

14533123322313.content:
And that was the first and last time you had a Red Sonja encounter.

The film releases you the next day, mainly because they don't want things to get weird between you and Rose since you saved her. So you're autographed picture of Rose joins your Red Sonja collection. But your Red Sonja collection isn't as important to you as it used to be, and you give up your secret dream of having a romantic relationship with Red Sonja.
14533123322313.title: gives you an autographed picture of herself

1453312332232.content:
You wake up in a cold sweat. You were having a weird nightmare.

In the nightmare, you're on the set of the 2010 Red Sonja movie, and repeatedly try to stop Rose McGowan over and over from her injury, s the movie can continue, with you perhaps getting some type of "reward" from Rose McGowan.

Instead, each time you keep failing.

When you wake up, your life changes. You're still a Red Sonja, but not as fanatical about it as you were before. You put away the scroll and soon forget about it. And your desire to have any type of "Red Sonja" as a girlfriend disappears.
